a.span: Bid Process on Security Improvement Plan

span.span: The Mission of the Creston Community School District is Cultivating Achievement and Responsibility while Educating all Students (Creston CARES).
The Vision of the Creston Community School District is to provide the foundation for students to become lifelong learners, and positive, confident, and compassionate citizens.

h1.span: Creston Community Schools are closed. If you need further assistance, please call the office at

span.a: Click here for the Superintendent's letter on school being closed
for the remainder of the year. (4-17-20)

span.span: Continuous Learning will be provided so students can continue to stay engaged and practice at their own pace and with or without guidance. At this time, students are not required to participate and no data is being collected or recorded. Staying engaged and maintaining relationships with our students and families is important to us, especially during these isolated times.

As we take these steps to provide opportunities to stay engaged, we understand that our families have different devices and access to technology and the internet. We have developed a plan to distribute devices so each student or family has access to one. Please visit this site for the timeline:
. If your child needs a device, please complete the

so we can make arrangements to provide you with one. We plan to use Zoom as a tool for students and staff to stay connected. Please understand that there are no classroom activities planned at this time and communication is directly between the student/family and teacher. It is important that our parents are aware of their child's engagement with district resources and staff.

Each building level in the district is developing Continuous Learning plans which will be posted on the district website and also provided by your child's classroom teacher. Continuous Learning may look different for each grade level and are age appropriately designed.

We encourage our students and parents to please email their teacher and they will do their best to respond between the hours of 8:00 a.m.-3:30 p.m. As we take steps to provide opportunities and stay engaged, we encourage our students, staff, families, and community to take care of themselves, take care of others!
Please visit your teachers Google Classroom for Opportunities

The district and the food pantry will offer the following opportunities for students and families to receive food and Grab & Go Meals from the high school parking lot modeled as a drive thru. Grab & Go Meals will not require preparation and are designed to provide a meal for the day and the following day. The food pantry intends to provide food that may last a weekend.
To help Creston Schools with meal preparation, we ask that you please sign up.
NOTE: Links are different for each day so if you wish to sign up for numerous days, you will need to complete each form:
LINK: Grab & Go Meal Request for
LINK: Grab & Go Meal Request for
High School Parking Lot High School Parking Lot
Join A Board Meeting Via The Web!

In accordance with Iowa Code Section 21.4(1)(b) the school board shall meet and conduct the regular board meeting electronically when it is impossible or impractical. Please call this toll free number 1-650-215-5226 to access the board meeting to participate in the public hearing. Please click on this

​It is the policy of the Creston Community School District not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, religion, creed, age (for employment), marital status (for programs), sexual orientation, gender identity and socioeconomic status (for programs) in its educational programs and its employment practices. There is a grievance procedure for processing complaints of discrimination. If you have questions or a grievance related to this policy, please contact the district's Equity Coordinator, Deron Stender (dstender@crestonschools.org), 801 North Elm, Creston, Iowa 50801
​Creston CSD offers career and technical programs in the following service areas:
Manufacturing, Business, Finance, Marketing and Management, Human Services
